Assistant Morris Holdings August 2016 to March 2018 The position provided administrative and secretarial support as well as IT and Accounting functions to the CEO Owner and various Stakeholders This position required utmost trust and confidentiality along with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple highlevel tasks and projects Strong organizational skills required Responsibilities Process and maintain accounts receivable accounts payables and bank reconciliations for multiple companies Maintain and reconcile multiple banking and investment accounts Maintain financial records multiple trusts and estate administration records Renew and maintain fictitious name filings and annual report filings for multiple US companies Assist in tax preparation for familyentities to include sales tax returns tangible tax returns personal tax returns and property taxes Track CEOs personal and business expenses Provided technology and creative consulting to the owner as needed Maintain a clean and organized office environment ensuring office supplies are ordered and the office is running smoothly Researched analyzed and created summary and comparison reports on emerging technology and various topics for the CEO and Stakeholders Interfaced with family members Property management firm Insurance agents Accountants Bankers Brokers and Attorneys Responsible for keeping all of the office tech functioning smoothly Tasks include backup local and remote software and hardware maintenance repairs and upgrades to NAS mobile devices computers and printers Responsible for planning and executing new and efficient workflows for managing and sharing of data through an internal network shared drive NAS Setup automatic backups over the network for office computers SERVICE CONCIERGE AT TESLA MOTORS Telsa Motors Tampa FL November 2015 to August 2016 Answered multiple lines during service hours and returned all customer requests the same day The position required strong organization multitask and follow up skills with the ability to stay focused in an extremely fastpaced office environment Responsibilities Coordinated repairs and service for a high volume Tesla service center for Tesla electric vehicles EVs Coordinated repairs and service for Mobile Service Technicians and Valet Drivers Provided basic troubleshooting for issues such as pairing Bluetooth devices to the vehicle arranging service for emergencies such as flat tires vehicle not drivable and other high priority repairs Performed full vehicle intakes prior to service authorizations Provided estimates for vehicle repairs products and additional service plans Coordinated loaner vehicles for internal and external customers from the Tesla fleet PRODUCT DATA SPECIALIST ECOMMERCE AT TOTAL HOME SUPPLY April 2015 to November 2015 Project involved migrating data from the Volusion web platform to the Mozu web platform Required basic HTML coding database administration and creative product writing CUSTOMER SERVICE AT MAC OF ALL TRADES Mac of all trades October 2014 to 2015 Provided support for customers via phone chat and email Reviewed web order sales for fraud Assisted with Ebay sales and support Handled customer escalations and managerial duties as needed Assistant Store Manager Apple Ridgeland MS August 2008 to June 2009 Managed 2530 retail employees keeping them motivated to keeping our customers happy knowledgeable and the retail store profitable Mac Genius Apple Coconut Point FL November 2007 to August 2008 Education CERTIFICATE in NUTRITION AND FITNESS PENN FOSTER CAREER SCHOOL 2015 to 2017
